document_data.name: ''Ropecutter''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ropecutters''''' were common [[enchanted]] [[kama]] used by sailors and pirates of the [[Nelanther Isles]] in the [[Sea of Swords]].
document_data.Powers: Seemingly ordinary kama, ''ropecutters'' were created to slash through ship ropes during boardings and emergencies. However, when on dry land, owners of ''ropecutters'' often used kama's minor enchantments to improve their thieving abilities.
document_data.History: ''Ropecutters'' were in common use in the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Notably, Captain [[Allendry]] of the ''[[Midnight Rose]]'' outfitted his crew and offered these kama for sale.
